name: Cross Roads Fire Department
description: Cross Roads Volunteer Fire Department is a volunteer fire department serving Northern Laurel County, Kentucky for over 35 years. The department provides emergency fire response, wildland firefighting, and community fire safety education. They serve in honor of Chief Basil Vaughn who died on a wildland fire in November 1987. The department operates 24/7 for emergency response and holds regular meetings on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month.
source: Verified from official website, Google Business listing, and Facebook page
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for emergency response
eligibility_requirements: Emergency services available to all residents in Northern Laurel County service area
populations_served: Residents of Northern Laurel County, Kentucky
cost_information: Emergency fire response services provided at no cost to residents
